Plot: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.
Title: The History Boys
Actors: Samuel Anderson, James Corden, Stephen Campbell Moore, Richard Griffiths
tomatoConsensus: While not quite having the impact of its original stage version, The History Boys nevertheless is a witty and involving school drama.
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 2 wins & 12 nominations.
